content: How can I create a C++ program that generates a random number between 1 and 100 and allows the user to guess the number? The program should give feedback on whether the guess is too high or too low and keep track of the number of guesses. Once the correct number is guessed, the program should display the number of guesses it took and ask if the user wants to play again. Use a loop to allow the user to play multiple times if desired.
